name: 俺が私に変わった日…- Becoming a She
name_original: 俺が私に変わった日…- Becoming a She
description:
"俺が私に変わった日…～Becoming a She～"" is a visual novel
game in which the protagonist, ""Rin Hoshina,"" who becomes a girl
after a year, spends an unusual school life with the girls he meets
at the girl's academy, he has transferred."
This Bishojo Game released in 2017 under the "Noirsoft" brand has been reworked for the "PandaShojo" platform for players of all ages worldwide to enjoy.

◆Introduction
I stand in front of the restroom in the hallway.
"This is a girls' restroom! Is it okay to go in here? This place is a sanctuary!
""What's wrong Rin-san?"" ""N..no, it's nothing!!"""
"Every day feeling a sense of immorality as I hide my true identity
and live my life as a girl. Which I am not familiar with.
Gradually, I became friends with the heroines, however, they also
have secrets that they can't tell anyone..."


◆Synopsis
"The protagonist, ""Rin Hoshina,"" was surprised by the look he saw
in the mirror.
Because there was a beautiful girl reflected in it."
"According to the doctor, Rin had a very unusual physical constitution
that his body will completely turn into a girl after a year.
As it becomes difficult for Rin to continue his ordinary life, the doctor
recommends him to go to a girl's academy to train himself to be a girl."
"But the body is still a man...
He has to live his life while wearing women's clothes and trying to
deceive others until he becomes a girl.
Will he be able to have a normal school life in a harem-like situation
without being discovered?"

◆Characters
Shiho Yahata
"Hi, nice to meet you. Are you the transfer student?"
"A gentle and kind senpai who's a year older than Rin.
Her beautiful behavior makes her look even more like an
upper-class lady."
"Having many girl fans, she is in the position of everyone's big sister.
She has a ""romantic nature"" which makes her struggle to control
her love life."


Honoka Kitami
"A boy,,, I'm glad to hear that, because it's rare in our school."
"Roommate and classmate of Rin.
With her bright and strong personality, she takes care of Rin."
"She is very kind toward Rin, helping him to hide his true identity.
She has a peculiar constitution but hasn't revealed it to Rin."


Azusa Sanjo
"""My name is Azusa Sanjo, and I'm a first-year! I've been looking
for the sister of my dreams for a long time."""
"A first-year who is popular among the seniors with her cute little
animal-like features.
On top of that, she loves to have attention from the seniors."
"She is especially fond of Rin, her physical contact, such as
body touching makes him feel uneasy.
She also has a peculiar constitution that she hides."


Rin Hoshina
"Protagonist with a peculiar constitution of ""gender-reversal disorder"".
He will completely become a girl in a year.
He transfers to a girls' academy as a second-year."
"His appearance is very feminine, and when dressing up as a girl,
it is unrecognizable at first glance.
However, not being used to it, he sometimes exposes the male side
of himself."
